mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM SC_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_BOARD ( IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_SC_BOARD_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE, 'Admin' )
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = NVL(HIT_CNT,0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM SC_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
